about_the_game:
What is Big Hops?

Big Hops is a fresh action-platformer about a friendly frog named Hop who's been kidnapped from his forest home by a mischievous spirit called Diss. To make it back to your mom and sister, you'll need to rebuild a broken Airship with parts from the Red Desert, Open Ocean, and Shattered Mountain.

Why were you kidnapped and what does Diss want with you? Only one way to find out...

Hey, Chris here! I’m the director of Big Hops. I hope it’s OK if I get a bit meta here:

With Big Hops, we want to take a step forward for 3D platformers rather than retreading existing ground. This game is our answer to the question 'What could 3D platformers be with deeper, freer movement and emergent gameplay?'

Deep Movement & Emergent Systems

Between familiar 3D platforming, fluid parkour, and fresh tongue mechanics, you have a lot of movement options as Hop! Once you learn the ropes, you'll be able to get around VERY fast. Get ready to run, jump, climb, wall-run, dive-roll, tongue swing, hookshot, and much more!

On top of deep movement, we've also got a deep sandbox. As you explore the world of Hops, you'll find loads of veggies each with surprising and useful effects on the world. You'll still be discovering new ways items can interact, even dozens of hours in.

Tongue-tastic!

It turns out adding a frog to a 3D platformer gives a lot of opportunity for fresh feeling tongue-focused gameplay! Aside from tasting veggies you can also use your tongue to:

  • Grab items from afar

  • Activate contraptions and solve puzzles

  • Swing around, launch yourself, hookshot up walls, and more

A World of Animals

Across the Red Desert, Open Ocean, and Shattered Mountain you'll meet a charming cast of animal friends and foes! In addition to frogs, you'll meet rabbits, raccoon, gulls, otters, bats, and more. Featuring adorable character designs by Steven Sugar.

Alongside frogs, you'll also find friendly rabbits, raccoons, gulls, otters, birds, geckos, bats, and more. Featuring adorable character designs by Steven Sugar.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Big Hops is a fresh and froggy action-platformer focused on deep movement and emergent gameplay! Use parkour and your tongue to explore 3 huge, colorful worlds full of charming animal friends and discover a huge range of surprising, playful interactions with veggies and gadgets!
